content.html: A Cloudflare outage knocked off a good part of the internet. This outage reminds me in impact when Facebook's SDK started crashing, breaking all mobile apps that used this SDK (which was a large number of mobile apps). Next up: how to mitigate when Cloudflare is down?
content.value:
A Cloudflare outage knocked off a good part of the internet. 

This outage reminds me in impact when Facebook's SDK started crashing, breaking all mobile apps that used this SDK (which was a large number of mobile apps).

Next up: how to mitigate when Cloudflare is down?
